title: World Athletics Javelin Finalist Annu Rani Takes Another Step Towards Olympics, With National Gold
text:
Annu Rani continued her nice run of form as she clinched another gold medal in the women's javelin throw at the National Open Athletics Championships.

Annu currently holds the national record at 62.43m which helped her make it to the final at the World Championships, won easily,

All of her throws were better than her rivals.

reuters

The 25-year-old opened with 56.97m, followed by 55.97, 58.31, 57.29 and 56.86 and 58.60m .

Neeraj Chopra on the other hand said he opted not to take part.

"AFI officials talked to my coach. And coach told me you are getting better but you never know what will happen in a competition when you exert yourself after so long. Then I decided to skip the event as I thought it is not good to take part by not heeding to what they are saying," Neeraj told PTI.

reuters

Don't Miss 7.1 K SHARES 4.6 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES 1.1 K SHARES

This is good news for her as she takes another step towards the Olynmpics. Let's see hoe things go from here.

Inputs From PTI
